about.foundingDay: Founding Day of Vietnam Military Engineering Corps
about.subtitle: Modern news platform, fast updates and reliable
about.intro: is a news website built to
about.introHighlight: celebrate the 80th anniversary of the founding of Vietnam Military Engineering Corps
about.introDesc: The website serves as a place to preserve, compile and share information, images, and stories about the glorious history of the Engineering Corps through 80 years of construction and development.
about.foundingDesc: On March 25, 1946, the Vietnam Military Engineering Corps was officially established, marking the birth of the first military technical force of the Vietnam People's Army.
about.resistanceDesc: Through two resistance wars against France and America, the Engineering Corps achieved many outstanding feats: opening the Ho Chi Minh Trail, building bridges and ferries, clearing mines, ensuring transportation...
about.gloryDesc: Commemorating 80 years of establishment, the Engineering Corps continues to develop, modernize, and make important contributions to the cause of national construction and defense.
about.historyDesc: Important historical stories and events about the formation and development of the Engineering Corps over 80 years.
about.heroesDesc: Honoring the generals, heroes, and soldiers of the Engineering Corps who contributed and sacrificed for the cause of national defense.
about.achievementsDesc: Outstanding feats and achievements of the Corps in resistance wars and the period of national construction.
about.newsEventsDesc: Updates on activities and events commemorating the 80th anniversary of the founding of the Engineering Corps nationwide.
about.modernizationDesc: The process of building, developing and modernizing the Engineering Corps in the new era.
about.gratitudeDesc: Expressing gratitude to generations of officers and soldiers of the Engineering Corps who contributed to the country.
about.motto: Firm ideology, overcome difficulties, Open the road to victory
about.mottoLabel: Traditional motto of the Engineering Corps
about.celebrateDesc: Join us in exploring the stories, images and information about the glorious history of Vietnam Military Engineering Corps.
